        public void handleCommand​(java.lang.String msg)
                   throws java.io.IOException
        Handles commands received from the client by calling the according methods or sending the appropriate messages to the client.
        Parameters:
        msg - command from client
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an IO errors occur.

      • shutdown

        public void shutdown()
        Shut down the connection to this client by closing the socket and the In- and OutputStreams. If the game of the client has not have a winner yet, an automatic winner is appointed and and the game is ended.
